properties.name: noneRequired
properties.description: The drawer will only be rendered in case there is at least one required drawer item. By setting this attribute to true, you will mark this item as optional. It will only be rendered if there is another item available for this drawer which is not optional.
properties.rawdescription:
The drawer will only be rendered in case there is at least one required drawer item.
By setting this attribute to true, you will mark this item as optional.
It will only be rendered if there is another item available for this drawer which is not optional.
